doc.name: BoxedValuesIcon
doc.description: This icon displays the value of all visible attributes of class Settable contained by the container of this icon. Visible attributes are those whose visibility is Settable.FULL. The names and values of the attributes are displayed in a box that resizes as necessary. If any line is longer than displayWidth (in characters), then it is truncated.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.property: The number of characters to display. This is an integer, with default value 80.
